messages.speech: Hotel/ Hospitality Management as a field requires aspirants to possess good communication skills as well as an impressive personality. Due to globalization, the hotel/ hospitality management industry is known to grow with leaps and bounds. Each year, a lot of hospitality related jobs are injected in the economy. These jobs are offered not only by Indian firms but also by international hotel chains. Thus, Hotel/ Hospitality Management is a fruitful field to make a career in. For more information about the colleges providing the course, you can visit- https://www.shiksha.com/hospitality-travel/hotel-hospitality-management-chp
